author: vhennebert
msg: Trying to get a glyph name out of a Unicode code point is already done by the call to mapChar, so doing it again in TTFFontLoader is useless. Instead, make use of the post table if it exists, that may contain a list of glyph names and allow more glyphs to be supported.
That allows to reference instead of embed a TrueType font that is already installed on the printer.
